item.title: Ghost Of Yotei - Guides Hub
item.content:encoded:

Are you excited to play Ghost of Yotei? The sequel to Sucker Punch's hit game, Ghost of Tsushima, stars a new protagonist: Atsu. After surviving a harrowing ordeal as a child and plying her trade as a mercenary, she has returned to her homeland to seek vengeance. You'll find yourself trekking across lush valleys and towering mountains, while delving into dark caverns and massive fortresses, all to put an end to your rivals. Our Ghost of Yotei guide tackles various facets to help you with the campaign.

Ghost of Yotei guides hub

Beginner's guide: 15 things you need to know before you play - Are you a newcomer who's just getting started or a long-time fan of Ghost of Tsushima who's ready for the sequel? Well, we've got a bunch of tips related to combat and exploration.

Which horse to pick - You can choose from several horse mounts, and you can even name your trusty pal.

How to get and use Traveler's Maps - Acquire maps through various means to reveal the locations of landmarks.

Best skills and techniques - Do you want to slice and dice your way through foes? How about sneakily assassinating your targets? Perhaps you'd like a playstyle that rewards successful parries and dodges? This Ghost of Yotei guide discusses the ideal perks for your character.

Altars of Reflection - If you do want to unlock more skills, then you have to find fixtures known as Altars of Reflection. Pay your respects at these shrines to select a perk.

Hot Springs - Do you want to improve your chances of survival? Don't fret because you just need to rest and relax in Hot Springs to increase your maximum health.

Bamboo Strikes - Now if you want to boost your spirit--i.e. the resource that allows you to heal and cast abilities while in combat--then you have to complete Bamboo Strike activities. These challenges require you to slice through bamboo shoots by pressing buttons in the correct order.

Gear: Charms - Are you looking for more ways to buff your character's capabilities? These charm accessories grant decent effects, and some have tallies that upgrade their potency.

We'll add more articles to our Ghost of Yotei guides hub, so stay tuned.
